member.name: T:Bricelam.EntityFrameworkCore.Design.EFCorePluralizerServices
member.summary: Used to the configure design-time services for this library.

member.name: M:Bricelam.EntityFrameworkCore.Design.EFCorePluralizerServices.ConfigureDesignTimeServices(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Adds this library's design-time services to the service collection.

member.name: T:Bricelam.EntityFrameworkCore.Design.Pluralizer
member.summary: Default pluralization service implementation to be used by Entity Framework. This pluralization service is based on English locale.

member.name: M:Bricelam.EntityFrameworkCore.Design.Pluralizer.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new instance of default pluralization service used in Entity Framework.

member.name: M:Bricelam.EntityFrameworkCore.Design.Pluralizer.Pluralize(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the plural form of the specified word.
member.returns: The plural form of the input parameter.
member.param: The word to be made plural.

member.name: M:Bricelam.EntityFrameworkCore.Design.Pluralizer.Singularize(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the singular form of the specified word.
member.returns: The singular form of the input parameter.
member.param: The word to be made singular.
